title: Which book? 哪一本书?
introduction: Listen to the tape and answer the question. Which book does the man want?
听录音并回答问题。这位男士想要哪一本书?

text_and_translation.text: MAN: Give me a book please, Jane.
WOMAN: This one? No, not that one. The red one.
text_and_translation.translation: 女人：这本？不，不是那本。是那本红的。

notes.title: Give me a book, please.
notes.describe: 请求对方给予某物的表达方式，其中'a book'指任意一本书。

notes.title: Which book?
notes.describe: 询问具体想要哪一本书，用于当有多于一本书可供选择时。

notes.title: The red one.
notes.describe: 指特定的一本书，这里通过颜色'red'来区分。
